title: Tiny Toot
overview: Tiny Toot is about 3 years old. She lives with her cat Gato, her brother, and her mum and dad ... and then there's Pixie, her magic making the elf who lives in a mouse hole in the wall. Every morning Pixie invites Tiny Toot and Gato on a new adventure. They eagerly join him in his nut-chopper and together they make friends with everyone they meet and learn new things about daily day life.
